title: Office Appropriate
description: Office Appropriate is a spin-off short story from Dear Daddy, Please Want Me, though it can be read as a standalone. Nikhil isn’t ready for a new Domme. The kind of humiliation that he craves is too dangerously close to the damage from his past relationship.There’s only one person that he trusts. One person who he’s been pining after for the past four years.It’s too bad that Christy works for him.But when the policies change, Christy steps in to claim him. He just needs the courage to accept both the dirty fantasies and the care that she offers.This is a femdom hurt/comfort short story with humiliation kink and a HEA. It can be found for free on ProlificWorks.
author: Reese Morrison
